intro.heading: We create memories that last
paragraphs: We are located in Konjevići, just three kilometers from the center of Čačak, along the main road Belgrade – Podgorica. Our location is perfect for travelers passing through and those who want to relax and enjoy a pleasant atmosphere. Whether you're looking for a quick meal, homemade specialties, or just a moment to rest, you'll find a warm atmosphere and top-notch service with us.

Hotel "Kole" 3* represents a center for business events and the perfect place for all types of celebrations – from weddings and birthdays to elegant dinners. With a diverse gastronomic offer and the proximity to the natural and historical landmarks of the Ovčar-Kablar Gorge, every stay with us becomes a true pleasure.
